description:
Open to Consultation from an AI (Picture) expert or an AI expert to execute

We currently have an automated turntable that will take 72 photos (every 5 degrees) which is for use of 360 effect product viewer such as the one on this amazon listing.

https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B0BTDX26B2/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o02_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1

Our products always start as a base bar and then we apply different addons to them for different listings for example

Sidebars

Sidebars + Strobes

Sidebars + Strobes + LEDs

Sidebars + LEDs

Sample 72 unedited images:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/n11oieue35i2l9czsd160/h?rlkey=n20revfl73l040mnkv3e4008l&dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/home/Andrew/72%20Raw/Sidebars%20Raw?share_manage_access=false

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/2efw7stb44l5660q7jw3w/h?rlkey=w7r02n6souw6m1aogu24jel7x&dl=0

We have currently photographed one sidebar at all 72 angles with both strobes and LEDs fitted

We need an easy way to bulk edit the 72 photos to remove/ add of these different additional products with the possibility of AI so we are not building multiple products all the time.

There are many different sidebars in our stock but they will all be mounted on the turntable at the exact same position as the previous bars and we need to know the possibility of being able to easily edit all 72 of these images to add on the additional products previously stated

Please see attached sample raw images from the turntable and also edited image

The background will also need to be removed as per the edited attached photos

2.

We also are looking to take a video of every product on the turntable for promotional use, due to the different additional products and the setup of the turntable there will be wires and brackets that would need to be removed from the video. Again need to know the possibilities of removing these with possible AI in Adobe suite

Will it also be possible to add and remove these additional products on the video such as stated in part 1 on the picture edit task.

The background will also need to be removed as per the edited attached photos

Sample Video:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/5qi6hzzrmss4tro2fjmpf/BT7_1121.MOV?rlkey=b7v5uxa05aokbdx04buv3aqtr&dl=0

3.

Currently we have a large amount of stock listed with white background but they have our logos on them, this is causing issues with SEO and google shopping listings so we need to have the logo removed from the images.

Issue is all images have the logo in different locations of the image ie different corners.

Is there a way we can select the logo and simply remove it possibility again of using AI giving it the logo and all the files that need to have it removed see attached example of logo circled

https://www.dropbox.com/home/Andrew/Image%20Check%20White?share_manage_access=false

4.

All the images that get taken on the turntable there needs to be an easy way of removing the background and converting to white but still keeping the shadow of the item.

Is there such function that AI can learn the item rather than the background and it removes anything that is not the item
highlights:
Qualifications:
 All the images that get taken on the turntable there needs to be an easy way of removing the background and converting to white but still keeping the shadow of the item, 
Responsibilities:
 There are many different sidebars in our stock but they will all be mounted on the turntable at the exact same position as the previous bars and we need to know the possibility of being able to easily edit all 72 of these images to add on the additional products previously stated, Please see attached sample raw images from the turntable and also edited image, The background will also need to be removed as per the edited attached photos, We also are looking to take a video of every product on the turntable for promotional use, due to the different additional products and the setup of the turntable there will be wires and brackets that would need to be removed from the video, 
Benefits:
 Sidebars + Strobes + LEDs
